To which Cosmo was flabberghasted since he had always wanted to tickle his wife's stomach, armpits, breasts and feet! So he tried to play it cool and said:
"Sure why not."
So Wanda magics herself into appropriate clothing for what is about to happen.

"Oh Cosmo, where are you most ticklish" Wanda sing songed devilishly.
"Oh no, i know what your gonna do, you're gonna tickle me as punishment" Cosmo said worriedly.
"No, I just wanna play a game so tell me your most ticklish spot" Wanda said.
"OK, it's my tummy, so what's the name of the game we're gonna play?" Cosmo asked stupidly.
